name: Upload Dress Images to Cloudinary & Log to Sheet with Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o)

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI agent tasked with extracting structured product information from a given product image description for children’s partywear (such as dresses, rompers, and gowns). Use the input description and generate a detailed product data entry that matches the following format and fields. Assume that certain attributes are constant across all products, while others are variable and must be derived from the image description or input. Output the information in a structured table or JSON format.

Constant Fields (use these values unless the description specifies otherwise):
 • Brand: Fairy Frills
 • On Sale: YES
 • Is Returnable Item: FALSE
 • Show In Store: YES
 • AttributeName1: Size
 • AttributeType1: Text
 • Minimum Order Quantity: 1
 • Maximum Order Quantity: 5
 • Stock On Hand: 1000
 • Opening Stock: 1000
 • Status: Active
 • Taxable: TRUE
 • Dimension Unit: cm
 • Weight Unit: kg

Variable Fields (derive these from the input description or as appropriate):
 • Product Name: [Extracted from main title or key description]
 Store Description: Must be concise, engaging, and include at least one SEO keyword. Limit to 1-2 sentences.
 • Long Description: Must be detailed, evocative, and SEO optimized. Highlight design, key features, materials, use occasions, and unique selling points. Minimum 80 words.
 • SEO Keyword: Include 5-8 comma-separated keywords, focusing on color, style, age group, occasion, and the Fairy Frills brand.
 • Tags: Include 6-10 comma-separated tags relevant to style, theme, occasion, and product type.
 • Product Handle: Must be unique, lowercase, URL-friendly, and based on the Product Name (use hyphens, no spaces or special characters).
 • Product Handle: [A URL-friendly version of the product name]
 • Primary Colour: From the image description
 • Secondary Colour: From the image description
 • Cloth Fabric: From the image description


Instructions:
 • For each image description provided, extract or infer all variable fields.
 • Write the Store Description as a concise and appealing summary.
 • Write the Long Description as a rich, detailed, and marketing-oriented paragraph.
 • Generate SEO Keywords and Tags based on the dress’s color, style, theme, and occasion.
 • Use the provided format and fill in all constant fields unless the image description clearly indicates otherwise.
 • If multiple size or color variants are visible, list each as a separate variant entry.
 • If any information is missing from the description, leave the field blank.
 • Do not invent or hallucinate details not supported by the description. Leave any missing fields blank.
 • All descriptions and keywords must be original, SEO-friendly, and tailored for e-commerce.
 • Do not repeat content across products; each entry must be unique.
 • Never use placeholder text like “lorem ipsum” or generic phrases.
 • If multiple variants (size, color) are described, create a separate entry for each variant.
 • Do not include any information not present in the description or specified constants.
 • All output must be in the exact JSON structure provided below. Do not add or remove fields.
 • No field should contain null values; if unknown, leave as an empty string “”.
 • All text must be grammatically correct, free of spelling errors, and formatted for professional e-commerce presentation.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "Product Name": "Enchanted Blush One-Shoulder Tutu Dress",
  "Store Description": "A beautiful blush pink one-shoulder party dress with layered tulle skirt and oversized bow, perfect for birthdays and special occasions.",
  "Long Description": "Let your little one shine in the Blush Pink Dream Tutu Party Dress, an elegant and stylish outfit that’s perfect for making memories. This dress features a shimmering blush pink bodice with a chic one-shoulder design, adding a modern twist to the classic tutu style. The layered tulle skirt gives it a fairy-tale feel, with soft, flowing layers that are ideal for twirling. An oversized pink bow at the waist adds a touch of charm, completing the look with grace. Perfect for birthdays, weddings, or any festive event, this dress promises comfort and elegance for any special occasion.",
  "Brand": "Fairy Frills",
  "On Sale": "YES",
  "Is Returnable Item": "FALSE",
  "SEO Keyword": "blush pink tutu dress, one-shoulder party dress for girls, layered tulle birthday dress, elegant toddler dress, Fairy Frills collection",
  "SEO Title" : "Beautiful Yellow Puff Dress for Baby Girls - Perfect for Birthdays and Special Occasions",
  "SEO Description": "Shop this adorable yellow puff dress for baby girls, designed for comfort and style. Ideal for birthdays, family gatherings, and special events. Featuring soft fabric, a fluffy design, and a sweet bow, it's the perfect choice for your little one's wardrobe.",
  "Show In Store": "YES",
  "AttributeName1": "Size",
  "AttributeType1": "Text",
  "Tags": "toddler birthday dress, Fairy Frills, pink tutu dress, party dress, layered tulle dress, one-shoulder dress, elegant dress",
  "Opening Stock": "1000",
  "Stock On Hand": "1000",
  "Status": "Active",
  "Taxable": "TRUE",
  "Product Handle": "enchanted-blush-one-shoulder",
  "Primary Colour": "Green",
  "Secondary Colour": "Yellow hints",
  "Cloth Fabric": "Cotton"
}

For Better Search, please select from our list

schema.id: Short description : 1 line description of the product.

schema.id: Long description : 2-3 lines brief description of the product. Include details in terms of fabric/ material, colour etc, which need to be highlighted.
schema.displayName: Long description : 2-3 lines brief description of the product. Include details in terms of fabric/ material, colour etc, which need to be highlighted.

schema.id:
Size : Mention the quanity available/reproducible against each size.
Incase it is reproducible indefinitely, please put 1000

Size : Mention the quanity available/reproducible against each size.
Incase it is reproducible indefinitely, please put 1000

schema.displayName: No. of pieces in a set

schema.id: primary color: main colour of the product

schema.id: Fabric Composition : please list all. If blend, please list %

parameters.content:
## Search files and folders
This node allows you to search for specific files and folders within a designated storage location or system.

## Loop Over Items
This node processes each item in a list individually, enabling actions like uploads or downloads to be performed in sequence.

## Search files and folders
This node allows you to search for specific files and folders within a designated storage location or system.

## Download file
This node downloads a file from a specified source or URL to be used in your workflow.

## Upload frames to Cloudinary
This node uploads image files (frames) to Cloudinary, a cloud-based media management platform, using a POST request.

## Azure OpenAI Chat Model
Connects to Azure OpenAI to process messages using a selected AI model, generating intelligent responses or actions.

## Azure OpenAI Chat Model
This node sends text prompts to an Azure-hosted OpenAI chat model, enabling AI-powered conversations or content generation.

## Append row in sheet
This node adds a new row of data to a connected spreadsheet, helping you record or update information automatically.

## Merge
This node combines data from multiple sources or nodes into a single output, streamlining workflow data management.

## Flattening descriptions
This node flattens output from the previous node

## Setting descriptions
This node is used to set the output from the previous output for better tracking

parameters.text: =Analyze the following image and craft a highly distinctive, vivid, and original description that captures its unique details, atmosphere, and mood. Ensure the description is unlike any other and avoids generic or repetitive language. The brand is Fairy Frills, which specializes in elite princess and fairy dresses for children. Focus on what sets this image apart visually and emotionally, providing a description that stands out and could not apply to any other image. Please do not reference the image in a typical or formulaic way; instead, highlight its one-of-a-kind features and essence. It is very important that you mention the primary colour of the dress, secondary colour of the dress, and the cloth fabric of the dress
